heading: HTM100 Week-1 EOC Quiz
description: This quiz demonstrates your understanding of today's class. Good Luck, You got this!!!

questions.question: What does HTML Stand For?
wrong: Hypertext Markup Script (Psst. It's not this)

questions.question: What is a correct Header Tag usage?
wrong: <a header tag>This is a header</ a header tag>
<not a header tag>This is a header</not a header tag>
<header>This is a header</header> (Psst. It's not this.)
